SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#jboss-v7-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME#/bin/jboss-cli.sh" --connect'
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOST# NE "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --controller=&UC4RB_JBOSS_HOST#" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PORT# NE "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI#:&UC4RB_JBOSS_PORT#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_USERNAME# NE "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --user=&UC4RB_JBOSS_USERNAME#" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PASSWORD# <> "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --password=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PASSWORD#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
